where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from ( select b.no, b.subject, r.username, b.hit, to_char(b.writedate,'MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from board b join register r on b.userid = r.userid
and ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by b.no desc )
where rownum <= ${onePageRecord*nowPage} order by no asc
)
where rownum <= ${onePageRecord} order by no desc
